sentences.sContent: When every molecule in your body tells you to run away from the burning building, as a firefighter you have to resist the urge, override it and plunge in.
sentences.sContent_eng: When every molecule in your body tells you to run away from the burning building, as a firefighter you have to resist the urge, override it and plunge in.
sentences.sCn: 当你身体内每个细胞都告诉逃离失火的建筑物时，作为一名消防员，你必须克制这种冲动，超越它，投入火场进行战斗。

sentences.sContent: He mows lawns and gardens for half a dozen clients in Grafton, some of them family friends. And he is an active volunteer firefighter.
sentences.sContent_eng: He mows lawns and gardens for half a dozen clients in Grafton, some of them family friends. And he is an active volunteer firefighter.
sentences.sCn: 他为格拉夫顿六户人家修剪草坪和花园，他们中一些是父母的朋友，此外他还是个积极的义务消防员。

sentences.sContent: Locally and from the state standpoint, we had some firefighter jobs that were in jeopardy, up in the hundreds.
sentences.sContent_eng: Locally and from the state standpoint, we had some firefighter jobs that were in jeopardy, up in the hundreds.
sentences.sCn: 站在州政府的立场，我们有一些消防员在危险岗位工作，最多时有数百人。

words.tran: 消防队员；救火队员；锅炉工

trans.tranOther: someone whose job is to stop fires burning
